column2: "So, you would like a license to increase the number of weapons you can equip. Then I will explain, as the ARKS regulations require."
"When you acquire this license, your number of Weapon Palettes will be increased to 6."
"This will allow you to register up to six sets of weapons and Techniques to switch between in battle."
"That's all from me. If you think you understand what you've learned, turn in the Client Order."
